section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: The European Boatmen’s Association (EBA) was founded in 1977 as a non-profit association. The association represents boatmen active in European ports. Its main purpose is to foster the professional development of boatmen and to promote the interests and objectives of the association at European and international level.
